meanings.definition: The plot or sequence of events in a novel, play, movie, etc.
meanings.sent1: The storyline of the movie kept me engaged from start to finish.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed the storyline of the book because it had many exciting twists.
meanings.sent3: The storyline of the play was so predictable that I guessed the ending halfway through.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a storyline straight out of a soap opera, full of drama and unexpected turns.
meanings.sent5: The storyline of the video game was so immersive that I felt like I was part of the action.

meanings.definition: A narrative or account of events.
meanings.sent1: The storyline in the history book was easy to follow and understand.
meanings.sent2: She shared a captivating storyline of her adventures during the summer vacation.
meanings.sent3: The storyline of the joke he told was so hilarious that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His explanation of the scientific theory was like a storyline that unfolded step by step.
meanings.sent5: The storyline of the fairy tale was filled with magic and wonder, enchanting all who heard it.
